trans-unit.source: Runtime Components: BizTalk Adapter Service
trans-unit.target: Runtime Components: BizTalk Adapter Service

trans-unit.source: When <token>lobconnect</token> runtime is installed, the following components are created:
trans-unit.target: When <token>lobconnect</token> runtime is installed, the following components are created:

trans-unit.source: <token>lobconnect</token> web site in IIS
trans-unit.target: <token>lobconnect</token> web site in IIS

trans-unit.source: Configuration store in <token>azure_1</token>
trans-unit.target: Configuration store in <token>azure_1</token>

trans-unit.source: To install and setup the Runtime, refer to <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure Service Bus EAI and EDI Labs - April 2012</link>.
trans-unit.target: To install and setup the Runtime, refer to <link xlink:href="10873203-56b3-445c-8340-ef073f5365f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Installing the Azure Service Bus EAI and EDI Labs - April 2012</link>.

trans-unit.source: <token>lobconnect</token> web site
trans-unit.target: <token>lobconnect</token> web site

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site and <legacyBold><legacyBold>BizTalk Adapter AppPool</legacyBold></legacyBold> are created in IIS.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site and <legacyBold><legacyBold>BizTalk Adapter AppPool</legacyBold></legacyBold> are created in IIS.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site contains the following:
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site contains the following:

trans-unit.source: BAService
trans-unit.target: BAService

trans-unit.source: An application that hosts the Management API that runs in the ManagementService.svc WCF web service.
trans-unit.target: An application that hosts the Management API that runs in the ManagementService.svc WCF web service.

trans-unit.source: This WCF web service runs continuously monitoring the <token>lobrelay</token>.
trans-unit.target: This WCF web service runs continuously monitoring the <token>lobrelay</token>.

trans-unit.source: The ManagementService.svc WCF web service uses a web.config file in the <legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft BizTalk Adapter Service\BAService</legacyItalic> folder.
trans-unit.target: The ManagementService.svc WCF web service uses a web.config file in the <legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft BizTalk Adapter Service\BAService</legacyItalic> folder.

trans-unit.source: When a LOB component is added, an application with the same name is also created.
trans-unit.target: When a LOB component is added, an application with the same name is also created.

trans-unit.source: This application hosts the RuntimeService.svc WCF web service.
trans-unit.target: This application hosts the RuntimeService.svc WCF web service.

trans-unit.source: A runtime service is created for <legacyItalic>every</legacyItalic> LOB component in the <token>msgflow</token> application.
trans-unit.target: A runtime service is created for <legacyItalic>every</legacyItalic> LOB component in the <token>msgflow</token> application.

trans-unit.source: So if there are 15 LOB components in the <token>msgflow</token> application, there will be at least 15 RuntimeService.svc WCF web services IIS.
trans-unit.target: So if there are 15 LOB components in the <token>msgflow</token> application, there will be at least 15 RuntimeService.svc WCF web services IIS.

trans-unit.source: The RuntimeService.svc WCF web service uses a web.config file in the <legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft BizTalk Adapter Service\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic> folder.
trans-unit.target: The RuntimeService.svc WCF web service uses a web.config file in the <legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft BizTalk Adapter Service\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic> folder.

trans-unit.source: Windows Authentication is specified for the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site and the <legacyBold>BAService</legacyBold> application hosted in this web site.
trans-unit.target: Windows Authentication is specified for the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site and the <legacyBold>BAService</legacyBold> application hosted in this web site.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site binds to port 8080.
trans-unit.target: By default, the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site binds to port 8080.

trans-unit.source: This port is set during the <token>lobconnect</token> setup and can also be modified in the web site in IIS.
trans-unit.target: This port is set during the <token>lobconnect</token> setup and can also be modified in the web site in IIS.

trans-unit.source: Reconnect Interval
trans-unit.target: Reconnect Interval

trans-unit.source: By default, an IIS application pool is configured to recycle every 1740 seconds (29 minutes).
trans-unit.target: By default, an IIS application pool is configured to recycle every 1740 seconds (29 minutes).

trans-unit.source: When the <legacyBold>BizTalk Adapter AppPool</legacyBold> recycles, a <token>lobrelay</token> may fail to start.
trans-unit.target: When the <legacyBold>BizTalk Adapter AppPool</legacyBold> recycles, a <token>lobrelay</token> may fail to start.

trans-unit.source: If a <token>lobrelay</token> fails to start, an attempt is made to restart the <token>lobrelay</token> after a fixed interval.
trans-unit.target: If a <token>lobrelay</token> fails to start, an attempt is made to restart the <token>lobrelay</token> after a fixed interval.

trans-unit.source: This is controlled by the <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> property, which has a default value of 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: This is controlled by the <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> property, which has a default value of 30 seconds.

trans-unit.source: To change or disable the reconnect interval:
trans-unit.target: To change or disable the reconnect interval:

trans-unit.source: Open the <legacyBold>Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Open the <legacyBold>Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold> and expand <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold> and expand <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Click <legacyBold>BAServiceRuntime</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Click <legacyBold>BAServiceRuntime</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Under the ASP.NET group, click <embeddedLabel>Application Settings</embeddedLabel> and click <embeddedLabel>Open Feature</embeddedLabel> in the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: Under the ASP.NET group, click <embeddedLabel>Application Settings</embeddedLabel> and click <embeddedLabel>Open Feature</embeddedLabel> in the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: To modify the reconnect interval, click <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> and click <embeddedLabel>Edit</embeddedLabel> in the Actions pane.
trans-unit.target: To modify the reconnect interval, click <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> and click <embeddedLabel>Edit</embeddedLabel> in the Actions pane.

trans-unit.source: Set this to any value in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Set this to any value in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For example, to set the reconnect interval to 5 minutes, enter 300.
trans-unit.target: For example, to set the reconnect interval to 5 minutes, enter 300.

trans-unit.source: To disable the reconnect interval, set <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> to any negative number, like <legacyBold>-1</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: To disable the reconnect interval, set <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> to any negative number, like <legacyBold>-1</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> can also be modified in the web.config file (<legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft BizTalk Adapter Service\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic>):
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>ReConnectIntervalInSeconds</embeddedLabel> can also be modified in the web.config file (<legacyItalic>\Program Files\Microsoft BizTalk Adapter Service\BAServiceRuntime</legacyItalic>):

trans-unit.source: The Recycling Settings in IIS can be configured.
trans-unit.target: The Recycling Settings in IIS can be configured.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>Configuring Recycling Settings for an Application Pool (IIS 7)</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235317</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>Configuring Recycling Settings for an Application Pool (IIS 7)</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=235317</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Administrators can make client requests to <token>lobconnect</token> web site
trans-unit.target: Administrators can make client requests to <token>lobconnect</token> web site

trans-unit.source: Users in the local Administrators group can make client requests to the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site within IIS.
trans-unit.target: Users in the local Administrators group can make client requests to the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site within IIS.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>BAService</legacyBold> application inherits the <legacyBold>.NET Authorization Rules</legacyBold> from the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site and the web server-level.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>BAService</legacyBold> application inherits the <legacyBold>.NET Authorization Rules</legacyBold> from the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site and the web server-level.

trans-unit.source: To allow non-Administrators to make client requests to the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site, use the .NET Authorization Rules feature within IIS:
trans-unit.target: To allow non-Administrators to make client requests to the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site, use the .NET Authorization Rules feature within IIS:

trans-unit.source: Open the <legacyBold>Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Open the <legacyBold>Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold> and click <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Expand <legacyBold>Sites</legacyBold> and click <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Under the ASP.NET group, double-click <legacyBold>.NET Authorization Rules</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: Under the ASP.NET group, double-click <legacyBold>.NET Authorization Rules</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>NET Authorization Rules Page</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229181</linkUri></externalLink> explains the UI elements.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>NET Authorization Rules Page</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229181</linkUri></externalLink> explains the UI elements.

trans-unit.source: In the Actions pane, click <embeddedLabel>Add Allow Rule</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the Actions pane, click <embeddedLabel>Add Allow Rule</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Add or Edit Allow Authorization Rule and Add or Edit Deny Authorization Rule Dialog Boxes</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229182</linkUri></externalLink> explains the UI options when <legacyBold>Add Allow Rule</legacyBold> or <legacyBold>Add Deny Rule</legacyBold> is used.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Add or Edit Allow Authorization Rule and Add or Edit Deny Authorization Rule Dialog Boxes</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229182</linkUri></externalLink> explains the UI options when <legacyBold>Add Allow Rule</legacyBold> or <legacyBold>Add Deny Rule</legacyBold> is used.

trans-unit.source: When <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> is installed, the identity specified during the Setup can make client requests to the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site.
trans-unit.target: When <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token> Runtime</legacyBold> is installed, the identity specified during the Setup can make client requests to the <legacyBold><token>lobconnect</token></legacyBold> web site.

trans-unit.source: This identity also has permissions to access the <token>lobconnect</token> configuration store.
trans-unit.target: This identity also has permissions to access the <token>lobconnect</token> configuration store.

trans-unit.source: Configuration Store
trans-unit.target: Configuration Store

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> configuration is stored in <token>azure_1</token> using your <token>af_integration</token> URL you specify during the setup.
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> configuration is stored in <token>azure_1</token> using your <token>af_integration</token> URL you specify during the setup.

trans-unit.source: When an item is created in Server Explorer in <token>vs_current_short</token> on the development environment, the store is updated.
trans-unit.target: When an item is created in Server Explorer in <token>vs_current_short</token> on the development environment, the store is updated.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="c5a79422-dad0-43ae-b2b4-99f0a8657ada" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Development: Creating an Application in Visual Studio</link> provides details on Server Explorer and the development experience.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="c5a79422-dad0-43ae-b2b4-99f0a8657ada" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Development: Creating an Application in Visual Studio</link> provides details on Server Explorer and the development experience.
